Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Global Wealth Management and Private Banking (GWMPB) are specialized financial services catering to high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) and ultra-high-net-worth individuals (UHNWIs). These services extend beyond traditional banking and encompass a comprehensive suite of financial solutions tailored to the unique needs and objectives of affluent clients.

Global Wealth Management focuses on managing and growing the wealth of HNWIs through a diverse range of investment strategies, including portfolio management, asset allocation, risk management, and financial planning. This holistic approach aims to preserve and enhance clients' wealth over the long term while addressing their specific financial goals, such as retirement planning, estate planning, and tax optimization.

Private Banking offers personalized banking services to HNWIs and UHNWIs. These services include bespoke banking solutions, exclusive investment opportunities, concierge services, and access to a dedicated relationship manager who understands their unique financial circumstances and aspirations. Private banks often act as trusted advisors, guiding clients through complex financial matters and providing tailored solutions to meet their evolving needs.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Finance or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Why Learn Java?

Java is a general-purpose, versatile and popular programming language. It's great as a first language because it is concise and easy to read, and it is also a good language to have in any programmer's stack as it can be used for everything from web development to software development and scientific applications.

Take-Away Skills:

This course is a great introduction to both fundamental programming concepts and the Java programming language. By the end, you'll be comfortable programming in Core Java.

This Course is the first of a series of courses that make up the Core Java Specialization. The Core Java Specialization, in turn, is part of a series of programming specializations and designed to provide the skill set necessary to be hired as an IT developer using Java in many corporate environments. This course includes hands-on practice and will give you a solid knowledge of the Java language. After completing this course, you will be able to identify Java’s benefits, program in basic Java syntax using Java data types, and incorporate branches and loops. The audience for this course: - Anyone interested in learning Java - Programmers - Technical Managers - Application Developers

courseDetails.title: Master AI Development with Python& ChatGPT Practical Project
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn AI Development with Practical Python Projects and ChatGPT Integration for Real-World Application
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Master AI Development with Python& ChatGPT Practical Project"

Welcome to an exciting journey into AI development! In this course, you will learn how to harness the power of Python and ChatGPT to create real-world applications. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your AI skills, this course will provide you with hands-on experience and practical tools to build projects that stand out.

Unlock the Power of AI Development with Python and ChatGPT

In this comprehensive course, you’ll learn how to master AI development through hands-on projects using Python and ChatGPT. Whether you're new to AI or looking to enhance your skills, this course will guide you through practical applications and real-world scenarios, ensuring you gain a deep understanding of how to leverage these technologies in your projects.

Build Real-World Python Projects

Throughout the course, you’ll work on practical Python projects that will help you understand the full potential of AI development. From building simple programs to creating more complex applications, you’ll learn how to use ChatGPT to streamline development, solve coding problems, and enhance functionality. These skills are essential for anyone looking to build AI-powered tools and software.

Integrate ChatGPT into Your Projects

One of the highlights of this course is learning how to integrate ChatGPT into your existing projects. You’ll discover how to use ChatGPT to generate code, add features, and solve development challenges in real-time. This integration is invaluable for developers who want to improve productivity and create sophisticated applications with AI.

Solve Problems and Enhance Your Coding Skills

Beyond building projects, this course will show you how to use ChatGPT to solve real coding problems. You’ll explore how to ask ChatGPT for help with debugging, enhancing code, and learning new programming concepts. With interactive lessons and practical exercises, you’ll be ready to take on any coding challenge with confidence.

Master AI Programming and Take Your Skills Further

By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped with the skills to develop AI-driven Python applications, enhance projects using ChatGPT, and apply your newfound knowledge to solve complex problems. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced developer, this course will help you master AI development and elevate your coding expertise to the next level.
targetAudiences: Novice developers looking to enhance their skills.
Professionals looking to improve their productivity and efficiency.
Freelance developers looking to streamline their workflow.
Aspiring entrepreneurs with a tech-based vision.

courseDetails.title: Complete Python Course for IT Administrators
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Python for IT Operations, Security Automation, and Network Management
courseDetails.longDescription:
Python is a powerful tool for IT professionals, system administrators, and network engineers looking to automate repetitive tasks, manage servers, and enhance system security. This course provides a comprehensive, hands-on approach to mastering Python for system administration, covering everything from basic scripting to advanced automation techniques. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced IT professional, this course will guide you through Python fundamentals, debugging, automation, networking, and database management.

You will start by learning the core concepts of Python, including variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming. As you progress, you’ll dive into file handling, system monitoring, logging, and remote server access using Telnet and SSH. You’ll also work with web scraping, MySQL database administration, and email automation, gaining valuable skills for IT operations. Additionally, the course covers regular expressions, text processing, and data analysis using NumPy and Pandas, enabling you to handle large datasets efficiently.

By the end of the course, you will have the ability to write efficient Python scripts for system administration, security, and automation. You’ll build real-world projects, including a Library Management System, automated file organizer, and network monitoring tool, preparing you for real IT challenges. This course is perfect for system administrators, cybersecurity professionals, and IT enthusiasts who want to enhance their skills and streamline their workflow with Python.

Take the next step in your IT career—enroll today and master Python for IT administration!
targetAudiences: Beginners in Programming – If you're new to programming and want to learn Python from the ground up, this course will take you step by step, building your skills along the way.
System Administrators – IT professionals looking to automate administrative tasks, manage servers, and streamline system operations will find this course invaluable
Network Engineers – Learn how to manage and monitor network configurations, access remote systems, and automate network-related tasks.
Cybersecurity Enthusiasts – Those interested in enhancing their security skills, automating network security tasks, and performing file encryption will benefit greatly from this course.
IT Enthusiasts & Automation Seekers – If you're an IT enthusiast or simply looking to improve productivity through automation of routine tasks, this course is perfect for you.

Students & Career Changers – Whether you're pursuing a career in IT or looking to upskill for job opportunities in system administration or automation, this course will provide practical knowledge and real-world applications.

courseDetails.title: Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

courseDetails.title: Ethically Hack the Planet
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Ethical Hacking: From Cybersecurity Basics to Advanced Attacks
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the foundational segment of our Ethical Hacking course, tailored to empower beginners in mastering the essentials of this dynamic domain. Led by a seasoned instructor, this module sets the stage for an illuminating learning journey.

Begin by unraveling the core concept of Ethical Hacking, understanding its pivotal role in cybersecurity. With a focus on practicality, you'll delve into Linux commands, building a robust skill set crucial for ethical hacking endeavors. These commands serve as the backbone for effective navigation within hacking scenarios.

The exploration advances to Phishing attacks, shedding light on their intricate methodologies and potential consequences. Equipped with this knowledge, you'll also grasp proactive measures to thwart such exploits.

The module's comprehensive approach extends to Browser Security, Location Security, and Wifi Testing—topics vital for comprehending modern cyber threats. This knowledge arms you with the ability to safeguard digital landscapes.

Continuing the journey, delve into Windows and Mobile Testing, exploring their vulnerabilities and defenses. Steganography's significance is uncovered, showcasing the covert techniques employed in concealing information.

The module culminates in Password Security, an essential skill for ethical hackers. By grasping various techniques, you'll be well-equipped to strengthen digital fortresses and avert potential breaches.

Under the mentorship of our seasoned instructor, this course module offers a solid bedrock for venturing into the realm of Ethical Hacking. Armed with an array of practical skills, you'll embark on a rewarding journey of exploration and growth in the realm of cybersecurity. Start your transformative learning experience today!
targetAudiences: IT Beginners and for Ethical Hackers.

courseDetails.title: CyberSecurity Bootcamp: The Ultimate Beginner's Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Knowledge that everyone must have. Learn how to protect your personal data from hackers. Take cyber security seriously.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you know what is the biggest threat in Cyber Security? The humans, it is so obvious. It’s all of us. The majority of security britches are actually being driven through social engineering and human interaction. Because we individually and collectively, just not taking cybersecurity seriously. We don’t know how to prevent the risks, the threats and vulnerabilities that exist in our behaviors and habits. We don’t have enough knowledge and training. We don’t teach ourselves to behave correctly when we use computers and electronic devices.

We must be aware of the correct simple things we need to do. Like best practices and general cybersecurity simple rules. And when we don’t do this, we open our doors widely for unauthorized access to our personal information to anyone. If we just know how to not do silly things and do things that can lead to compromise. We are all going to be more secure.

This is what our course is all about. We will show how easy it is to follow just a few simple cybersecurity practices. That will keep your personal information safe from unauthorized access and will keep you away from troubles.

The purpose of this course is to help you understand how to protect the personal data you have recorded on your computers, laptops and mobile devices. You will understand what the best practices are. How simple it is to secure your devices. And how this can prevent attacks and make your devices more secure.

You will learn what Social Engineering is and how the hackers are using it. Why must you keep your software always updated. What is the advantage of using strong passwords and password managers? You will understand why it’s important to enable 2FA/MFA for all your accounts. Also, what is device encryption, why you need it and how it protects you. Why you should avoid using public Wi-Fi and how VPN can protect you.

Why you must use antivirus software, from what attacks it can protect you. How to be cautious and how to prevent data breaches of your personal data and identity.

We will explain you what Malware is and its types:

- Trojan Horse

- Adware

- Spyware

- Browser Hijacking

- Virus

- Worms

- Scareware

You will learn how to recognize phishing emails, how to browse safely, and communicate securely.

At the end of the course you will know how to protect your electronic devices. You know the meaning of the main cybersecurity threats and terminology and how to recognize them.

We have created a course for everyone who uses some kind of electronic device, uses the internet and wants to protect his personal data or learn more about the Cybersecurity threat.

The terminology is simply explained with interactive professional videos and examples.

Don’t wait, take this course and educate yourself. Educating yourself and others — is by far the most effective defense you can do against all faces of Cyber Attacks.

Start your Security Awareness training now. Take Cyber Security seriously.
targetAudiences: Everyone who is using electronic devices like computers, laptops and mobile phones.
Everyone who wants to know how to protect his personal data.

The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is a pivotal leadership role within an organization, responsible for steering the company towards its strategic goals and ensuring its overall success. The CEO serves as the highest-ranking executive and is accountable for the overall performance, direction, and decision-making of the company. The role encompasses a diverse set of responsibilities, and a CEO is expected to wear multiple hats to effectively lead and manage the organization.


Key aspects of the CEO role include:


Strategic Vision and Planning: The CEO is responsible for developing and communicating a clear vision for the company. They must also formulate and execute strategic plans that align with the organization's mission and objectives.


Leadership and Decision-Making: CEOs provide leadership to the executive team and the entire organization. They make crucial decisions that impact the company's direction, growth, and overall performance.


Stakeholder Management: CEOs must effectively engage with various stakeholders, including investors, customers, employees, and the board of directors. Building and maintaining positive relationships with these stakeholders is crucial for the company's success.


Risk Management: CEOs are tasked with identifying and mitigating risks that could impact the organization. This includes overseeing financial management, regulatory compliance, and other aspects that contribute to the company's stability.


Innovation and Adaptability: CEOs must foster a culture of innovation within the organization and be adaptable to changes in the business environment. They play a crucial role in ensuring the company remains competitive and responsive to market dynamics.


Corporate Governance: CEOs are responsible for upholding ethical standards and ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements. They work closely with the board of directors to maintain effective corporate governance.


For employers and managers, understanding the CEO role is essential for several reasons:


Strategic Alignment: Employees at all levels need to understand how their work contributes to the overall strategic objectives of the company. Knowledge of the CEO's role helps align individual and team efforts with the organization's vision.


Decision-Making Perspective: Managers can benefit from understanding the decision-making processes of CEOs. This knowledge can enhance their own decision-making skills and enable them to contribute more effectively to the organization.


Leadership Development: Aspiring leaders can learn from the CEO's leadership style and strategies. Studying the CEO role provides valuable insights into the qualities and skills required to lead an organization successfully


Career Advancement: Employees with a comprehensive understanding of the CEO role are better equipped to advance their careers. They can position themselves as strategic thinkers and leaders, making them valuable assets to the organization.


For those aspiring to become future CEOs, acquiring knowledge about the CEO role is crucial for building a successful career.


This includes:


Leadership Skills Development: Learning from the experiences and approaches of successful CEOs helps in honing leadership skills. This includes the ability to inspire and motivate teams, make tough decisions, and navigate complex challenges.


Strategic Thinking: Future CEOs must develop a strategic mindset, understanding how to set long-term goals, analyze market trends, and make decisions that position the company for sustainable growth.


Communication and Stakeholder Management: Effective communication with various stakeholders is a critical aspect of the CEO role. Developing strong communication and relationship-building skills is essential for future leaders


Financial Acumen: CEOs are responsible for the financial health of the organization. Building financial literacy and understanding key financial metrics is crucial for making informed decisions and ensuring the company's success.


Adaptability and Resilience: The business landscape is dynamic, and CEOs must navigate uncertainties and challenges. Future CEOs should cultivate adaptability and resilience to thrive in ever-changing environments.


Understanding the role of a CEO is essential for both current managers and aspiring leaders. It provides valuable insights into effective leadership, strategic decision-making, and the overall dynamics of running a successful organization. This knowledge not only contributes to individual career development but also enhances the overall performance and success of the company.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career as CEO or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals Complete Training
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass AZ-900 with Confidence | Learn Azure in Step By Step Approach | Practice Test Included
courseDetails.longDescription:
The AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals Complete Training course is an in-depth guide to mastering the foundational concepts of Microsoft Azure, perfect for beginners aiming to kickstart a career in cloud computing.

This course thoroughly covers essential Azure services, cloud computing principles, and management tools, making it ideal for IT professionals, developers, and anyone preparing for the AZ-900 certification exam.

Through detailed sections and hands-on labs, you'll gain confidence in navigating Azure’s environment and learn practical applications of cloud computing in a variety of business scenarios.

Course Overview

  1. Basics of Cloud Computing: Start with understanding cloud computing fundamentals, including various service types (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) and the shared responsibility model. You'll explore cloud deployment models (public, private, and hybrid) and gain a clear understanding of CapEx and OpEx in cloud infrastructure.

  2. Benefits of Cloud Computing: Dive into the numerous advantages of cloud adoption, such as scalability, high availability, and reliability. This section will help you understand how cloud computing can be cost-effective and secure while allowing businesses to go global with minimal infrastructure investments.

  3. Creating Setup for Azure Labs: This section walks you through creating a free Azure account to set up a lab environment, providing a hands-on foundation for practical learning.

  4. Core Architectural Components of Azure: Gain insights into Azure datacenters, availability zones, global infrastructure, regions, and region pairs, laying the groundwork for understanding Azure’s global footprint and operational resilience.

  5. Management Structure of Microsoft Azure: Understand the organizational structure within Azure, from resources and resource groups to subscriptions and management groups, which helps in organizing and managing access and billing.

  6. Azure Networking Services: Learn about Azure's robust networking capabilities, including Azure Virtual Network (VNet), Network Security Groups (NSGs), private and public endpoints, and ExpressRoute for secure connectivity.

  7. Azure Compute: Discover compute options such as Azure Virtual Machines, Virtual Desktops, Containers, Functions, and application hosting, allowing for versatile workload management.

  8. Azure Storage Services: This section covers storage options like Azure Blob Storage, Azure Queues, Table Storage, Disk Storage, and migration tools, emphasizing storage redundancy for enhanced data resilience.

  9. Identity & Access Management in Azure: Learn Azure Active Directory (AD), Azure AD Domain Services, conditional access, RBAC, and the Zero Trust model, providing a robust identity and security foundation.

  10. Cost Management in Azure: Understand factors affecting costs, the Azure Pricing Calculator, Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator, and Azure Cost Management Tool to efficiently monitor and manage expenses.

  11. Governance and Compliance Tools: Discover Azure Blueprints, Azure Policy, Resource Locks, and the Azure Service Trust Portal, enabling compliance and governance within cloud environments.

  12. Azure Management Tools: Get hands-on with tools like the Azure portal, Cloud Shell, CLI, PowerShell, Azure Arc, and ARM templates for managing and automating Azure resources.

  13. Monitoring Tools in Azure: Learn to use Azure Advisor, Service Health, and Azure Monitor to optimize resource usage, improve system health, and stay proactive with recommendations and alerts.

Enroll in AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals Complete Training to gain comprehensive, practical knowledge essential for Azure certification success and advancing your cloud computing career.

This course equips you with all the tools and understanding needed to thrive in the ever-evolving world of Azure.
targetAudiences: IT Professionals who are new to cloud computing and want to build a foundational understanding of Azure services and concepts
Business Decision Makers who want to integrate Azure services into their applications and need a fundamental understanding of Azure infrastructure

courseDetails.title: Time Management Accelerator: Turbocharge Your Productivity
courseDetails.shortDescription: Accelerate your journey to success with our time management masterclass, designed to turbocharge your productivity.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Time Management Accelerator: Turbocharge your productivity" where you'll embark on a transformative journey to take charge of your time and elevate your productivity to new heights. In this comprehensive course, we'll delve into seven key topics designed to equip you with the tools, strategies, and mindset needed to conquer your to-do list and achieve your goals efficiently and effectively.

Topic 1: Understanding Time and Productivity

Our journey begins with a deep dive into the fundamentals of time management and productivity. You'll explore the concept of time as a finite resource and learn how to harness it to maximize your productivity. We'll debunk common myths and misconceptions about time management, setting the stage for a paradigm shift in your approach to work and life.

Topic 2: Prioritization Strategies for Success

Effective prioritization is the cornerstone of productivity. In this module, you'll discover proven techniques for identifying your top priorities and allocating your time and energy accordingly. From Eisenhower's Matrix to the ABCDE method, you'll explore a variety of prioritization frameworks and learn how to apply them to your daily tasks and projects.

Topic 3: Mastering Task Management

Say goodbye to scattered to-do lists and missed deadlines. In this topic, you'll learn how to build a robust task management system that keeps you organized and on track. From capturing tasks to setting deadlines and tracking progress, you'll gain practical skills to streamline your workflow and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

Topic 4: Overcoming Procrastination and Resistance

Procrastination is the enemy of productivity, but it doesn't have to be. In this module, you'll uncover the root causes of procrastination and resistance and explore strategies for overcoming them. Whether it's breaking tasks into smaller steps or using the Pomodoro Technique to stay focused, you'll learn how to outsmart procrastination and unlock your full potential.

Topic 5: Maximizing Focus and Concentration

In today's digital age, distractions abound, making it challenging to stay focused on the task at hand. In this topic, you'll discover techniques for sharpening your focus and boosting your concentration. From practicing mindfulness to creating distraction-free work environments, you'll learn how to minimize interruptions and optimize your cognitive performance.

Topic 6: Strategic Time Blocking and Scheduling

Time blocking is a powerful productivity technique that allows you to allocate dedicated time slots for specific tasks and activities. In this module, you'll master the art of time blocking and learn how to create a well-balanced schedule that accommodates your priorities and goals. We'll cover everything from daily routines to weekly planning, empowering you to make the most of every moment.

Topic 7: Cultivating Sustainable Habits for Success

Last but not least, sustainable habits are the key to long-term productivity and success. In this final topic, you'll explore the science of habit formation and learn how to cultivate positive habits that support your goals. From morning routines to evening rituals, you'll discover actionable strategies for building habits that stick and propel you toward your desired outcomes.

By the end of this course, you'll emerge with a newfound sense of confidence and control over your time and productivity. Whether you're a busy professional, an aspiring entrepreneur, or anyone seeking to achieve more with less stress, "Time Mastery" will empower you to unlock your full potential and live your best life.
targetAudiences: Professionals seeking to overcome obstacles hindering their productivity and efficiency in the workplace
Individuals striving to optimize time management skills and enhance overall performance in their careers

courseDetails.shortDescription: İleri Seviye Excel Kullanıcısı Olmak İçin A'dan Z'ye Her Şeyi (Tablolar, Grafikler, Formüller, Tasarımlar...) Öğrenelim!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Merhaba arkadaşlar,


Bu alanda sizlere Microsoft Excel kullanmanın avantajlarından bahsetmeyeceğim, şu an bu veya benzeri kursları inceliyorsanız böyle bir bilgilendirmeye ihtiyacınızın olduğunu düşünmüyorum ancak bu eğitimin içeriğine ve eğitimden maksimum fayda sağlayabilmek için uygulayabileceğiniz birkaç küçük bilgiye değinmek istiyorum.


Excel eğitim kursumuz, kurs içeriğinden de anlaşılacağı üzere teorik ve pratik kabiliyet kazandırıp öğrenme sürecinin pekiştirilebilmesi açısından tıpkı lise, üniversite ders müfredatlarında olduğu gibi belirli bir disiplin ve metodik sıralı hiyerarşiye bağlı kalarak hazırlanmıştır. Yani emeklemeden koşturmaya yönelik gereksiz ve zorlayıcı bir sürecin içinde olmayacaksınız.


Bununla birlikte kursumuz 28 saat uzunluğunda olup içinde 22 bölüm, 217 ders, 180 formül, +1.000 benzersiz bilgi, +1.000 örnek/genel tekrar, başlangıç ve bitiş aşamasında olmak üzere 2 adet Seviye Tespit Sınavı, 70 adet egzersiz dosyası barındırmaktadır.


Yine hem kurs isminden hem de içindekiler öğelerinden de anlaşılacağı üzere eğitim kursumuz, temelden yani başlangıçtan ileri seviyeye olmak üzere her seviyeye hitap edebilecek şekilde mümkün olduğunca basit ancak detaylı, aceleden uzak tane tane anlatım metodu benimsenerek hazırlanmıştır. Bu açıdan eğer iyi bildiğinizi düşündüğünüz bir ders veya konu varsa ilgili dersi pas geçmek de bir tercih olsa da bu yolu tercih etmenizi tavsiye etmiyorum. Her ne kadar derslerin açıklama kısmında ilgili derslerin içerikleri paylaşılmış olsa da dersin işlenme aşamasında farklı konu ve noktalara değinilmiş olabilir. Öte yandan hem bu tercih yerine (yani dersi izlemeden pas geçmek) hem de hem de video akışını kendi anlama ve öğrenme alışkanlığınıza uygun olarak kalibre edebilmek adına ders videolarının hızını arttırmayı ya da azaltmayı birinci seçenek olarak değerlendirmeniz yararınıza olacaktır.


Öğrenme sürecinize pozitif etki edebilecek bazı tavsiyeler de vermek istiyorum.


  • Konsantre olun. Ders videolarını izlerken konsantrasyonunuzu olumsuz etkileyecek faktörleri minimize etmelisiniz.

  • Not alın. Zorlandığınız veya karıştırdığınız noktalarda basit ve adım adım notlar almanız yazım esnasında da size tekrar etme imkanı vereceğinden etkili olacaktır.

  • Pratik yapın. Ders videolarının önemli bir kısmında pratik yapabilmeniz için ilgili derse ait egzersiz dosyaları bulunmaktadır. Hem bu dosyalar üzerinden hem de farklı kaynaklardan bulacağınız örneklerle bol bol pratik yapmanız öğrenme sürecinizin kısalmasına büyük katkı verecektir.

  • Farklı kaynaklardan da yararlanın. Yalnızca bu ders içeriğinde alacağınız bilgilerle yetinmeyin, farklı kaynaklar üzerinden de araştırma yapmanız, video izlemeniz hem tekrar etme ve pratik yapma imkanı sunacak hem de bilgi dağarcığınızı zenginleştirecektir.

  • Ders videolarının hızını arttırın. Ders videolarını izledikten sonra hızı arttırarak tekrar izlemek dersin pekiştirilmesi açısından önemli katkı verecektir.

  • Disiplinli olun. Bu aşamada size verebileceğim en önemli tavsiyem azimli ve disiplinli olmanızdır. Kendinize göre periyodik bir planlama yaparak düzenli bir biçimde dersleri izlemeniz, araştırmanız, azami derecede pratik yapmanız son derece önemlidir. Zira herhangi bir kaynaktan alacağınız bilgi hap niteliğinde değildir, takviyedir. Bu takviye ancak azim ve disiplin ile birleştiği takdirde öğrenme hızınızı ve becerinizi maksimize edecektir.


Excel kullanım kabiliyetinizin ileri seviye olarak değerlendirilmesi konusunda dünya genelinde kabul görmüş standartlar bulunmamaktadır. Bununla birlikte ileri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olmak için aslında öne çıkan iki parametre vardır; hız ve bilgi. Bu açıdan öncelikli hedefimiz bilgi birikimimizi arttırmak sonrasında ise bol pratik ile hızlanmak olmalıdır. İleri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olabilmeniz için bilginizi ve hızınızı arttıracak tüm girdileri bu eğitim kursumuzda bulabileceksiniz.


Öte yandan başlangıç ve bitiş sınavları ile birlikte kat ettiğiniz mesafeyi eğitimin sonunda kendiniz de görebileceksiniz.


Umarım keyifli ve faydalı bir eğitim süreci olur, sağlıcakla:)
targetAudiences: Microsoft Excel kullanımını öğrenmek ya da mevcut deneyimini/seviyesini ilerletmek isteyen herkes katılım gösterebilir.

courseDetails.title: AI-Powered Scrum Master: PSM Cert & Interviews
courseDetails.shortDescription: Empower Your Career with Agile and Scrum Knowledge for PSM Success
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock your potential with our comprehensive course, "Agile & Scrum: Your Path to PSM Certification." Designed for both beginners and experienced professionals, this course equips you with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in Agile project management and prepare for the Professional Scrum Master (PSM) certification.

Throughout this course, you will:

  • Understand Core Concepts: Dive deep into Agile principles and Scrum framework, including key roles, events, and artifacts.

  • Develop Practical Skills: Engage in hands-on activities, case studies, and real-world examples to apply Agile methodologies effectively.

  • Master the PSM Exam: Gain insights into the PSM certification process, exam structure, and effective study strategies to enhance your success.

  • Build High-Performing Teams: Learn how to foster collaboration, communication, and accountability within Agile teams.

  • Enhance Your Career: Position yourself as a valuable asset in the job market by acquiring industry-recognized Scrum expertise.

In the course "Agile & Scrum: Your Path to PSM Certification," participants will learn core Agile principles and values, explore the Scrum framework, and understand the roles of the Scrum Master, Product Owner, and Development Team. The course covers essential Scrum events, including Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, and Sprint Retrospective, as well as key artifacts like the Product Backlog, Sprint Backlog, and Increment.

Additionally, students will gain insights into the Definition of Done and its importance for quality assurance. The course also focuses on Agile estimation and planning techniques, provides strategies for building high-performing teams, and offers guidance on preparing for the PSM certification exam, including study tips and practice questions. Real-world case studies and practical exercises ensure that participants can apply their knowledge effectively in real-world scenarios.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course Professional Certificate in Marketing & Marketing Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 440 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.


Here's a simple analogy:

  • Marketing is like cooking a delicious meal. It involves finding the right recipe (products/services), sourcing the best ingredients (market research), and carefully preparing the dish (advertising, promotions).

  • Marketing Management is like being the head chef. They devise the overall menu (marketing strategy), manage the kitchen staff (marketing teams), ensure the budget is efficient, and keep track of customer feedback (measuring results) to perfect future meals.

Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.

Social Media Marketing (SMM):

Social Media Marketing is a form of digital marketing that utilizes social media platforms to promote products, services, or brands. It involves creating and sharing content on social media networks to engage with a target audience, increase brand awareness, and drive website traffic. SMM encompasses various activities such as posting text and image updates, videos, and other content that sparks user engagement.


Social Media Management:

Social Media Management involves the strategic planning, monitoring, and execution of a company's social media marketing efforts. It includes tasks like creating content calendars, responding to comments and messages, analyzing performance metrics, and adjusting strategies based on data.


Why Social Media Marketing Matters

Social media marketing offers numerous advantages for businesses of all sizes and across all industries. Here are some key benefits:

  • Increased Brand Awareness: Social media platforms provide a powerful tool to reach a wider audience and establish your brand identity. By consistently sharing valuable content and engaging with your followers, you can build brand recognition and create a positive brand image.

  • Enhanced Customer Engagement: Social media fosters two-way communication, allowing you to connect with your customers directly. You can address their questions and concerns, build relationships, and foster brand loyalty.

  • Lead Generation and Sales Growth: Social media campaigns can generate leads by attracting potential customers and directing them to your website or landing pages. You can leverage targeted advertising and calls to action to convert leads into paying customers.

  • Market Research and Insights: Social media listening tools allow you to track brand mentions, analyze audience demographics and interests, and gain valuable insights into customer sentiment. This information can be used to refine your marketing strategies and tailor content to resonate better with your target audience.

  • Improved Brand Reputation Management: Social media allows you to proactively manage your brand reputation by addressing negative feedback promptly and showcasing positive customer experiences.


Importance for Companies and Managers:


Enhanced Communication:

Social media marketing and management skills enable companies to communicate directly with their audience, fostering brand loyalty and customer satisfaction.


Brand Building:

Social media is a powerful tool for brand building. Effective SMM can enhance brand visibility and reputation, leading to increased trust and credibility.


Customer Engagement:

Social media management allows companies to engage with their audience in real-time, addressing concerns, gathering feedback, and building a community around the brand.


Marketing Effectiveness:

Social media platforms provide targeted advertising options. Knowing how to leverage these tools through SMM enhances the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.


Career Development and Business Success:


Versatility:

Learning social media marketing, management, equips professionals with versatile skills applicable across various industries and roles.


Competitive Edge:

Professionals who master these skills have a competitive advantage in the job market. Companies value employees who can effectively communicate, market products, and manage social media presence.


Entrepreneurial Success:

For entrepreneurs, these skills are crucial for establishing and promoting their own businesses. Effective communication and marketing strategies can significantly contribute to business success.


Adaptability:

In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, individuals who continuously enhance their skills in these areas demonstrate adaptability and are better positioned for career growth and business development.


The solid understanding of social media marketing, management and business writing is invaluable for companies and managers. It not only facilitates effective communication but also contributes to brand building, marketing success, and overall career development. In the dynamic business environment, these skills are instrumental in staying competitive and achieving long-term success.

¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS DE FORMA RÁPIDA Y SENCILLA?


En este curso te voy a hablar del servicio conocido como Elementor Hosting, te voy a mostrar lo fácil que es crear una página web profesional con uno de los mejores plugins para WordPress, conocido como Elementor, el cual tiene más de 15 millones de instalaciones activas en WordPress, es un gran constructor visual, uno de los más fáciles de usar con tan solo arrastrar y soltar elementos, puedes tener un sitio web prácticamente creado en minutos.


¿QUÉ ES ELEMENTOR HOSTING?


La empresa de Elementor te ofrece una solución completa, la cuál no solo te incluye el servicio de hosting, sino también incluye de forma pre instalada la plataforma de WordPress, al igual que también incluye la versión de Elementor Pro, entre todos los beneficios que incluye este servicio en su plan básico, también obtienes 10 gigas de almacenamiento de disco duro, 30 gigas de ancho de banda por mes, lo cuál te permite recibir hasta 25.000 visitas mensuales.

Si aún no puedes adquirir un dominio en este momento, puedes crear tu sitio web sobre un subdominio gratuito bajo Elementor Hosting, en donde puedes empezar de inmediato, incluye también copias de seguridad diarias, un certificado SSL gratuito de Cloudflare y migración gratuita de tu sitio web, todo esto en un mismo plan y con un simple pago anual.

Elementor Hosting es un alojamiento de WordPress administrado con tecnología de la plataforma de Google Cloud, plataforma en la que confían miles de empresas de primer nivel gracias a su seguridad y confiabilidad de clase mundial.

Con Elementor Hosting tienes también integrado Cloudflare, el servicio más reconocido de Red de Distribución de Contenido, el cual utiliza servidores distribuidos en todo el mundo para que tus visitantes sean dirigidos automáticamente a tu sitio web, de acuerdo al servidor más cercano, permitiéndote que tu sitio web cargue mucho más rápido.

Elementor Hosting también ofrece una herramienta de almacenamiento en caché integrada para aumentar aún más la velocidad de carga y le brinda la opción de ajustar aún más el almacenamiento en caché de tu sitio web con plugins de optimización.

Adicionalmente, Elementor Hosting también te ofrece varias opciones de seguridad como protección de DOS y WAF bloqueo de sitio y monitoreo las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress, también utilizaremos la plataforma de Elementor Hosting que nos brindará el apoyo y la arquitectura necesaria para diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Hosting, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting en Elementor.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress y Elementor Hosting desde cero.

  • Cómo instalar plantillas prediseñadas con Elementor Kits para comenzar a crear tu sitio web.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web con Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo publicar tu sitio web en Internet.



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Elementor Hosting: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Hosting de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y Elementor Hosting.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB PARA TU NEGOCIO CON LA AYUDA DE LA INTELIGENCIA ARTIFICIAL?


Crear una página web con Inteligencia Artificial hace que todo sea más fácil y te ahorra tiempo y esfuerzo, que puedes utilizar para tareas más importantes. Si tu presupuesto no es muy alto, crear una página web con IA te ayuda a ahorrar dinero. Es más económico que contratar un desarrollador web.


El Creador de Sitios Web con IA de Hostinger es una herramienta online que utiliza inteligencia artificial para crear un sitio web personalizado desde cero. De esta manera, puedes generar una web de forma más fácil y rápida. Adicionalmente, el creador web con IA de Hostinger ofrece herramientas incorporadas para que puedas hacer más modificaciones a tu sitio web.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA EL CREADOR DE SITIOS WEB CON IA DE HOSTINGER?


Es fácil. Solo tienes que describir tu negocio y elegir el sitio web que más te guste y se adapte a lo que necesitas.

El creador con IA escribirá el contenido, utilizará imágenes libres de derecho y elegirá los colores y tipografías adecuados para ti, según tu descripción.

Una vez se genera tu sitio, puedes personalizarlo aún más con el editor de arrastrar y soltar. Modifica y agrega imágenes, videos, botones, textos y más.

Cuando termines de crear y personalizar tu sitio web, puedes publicarlo en Internet.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con Inteligencia Artificial, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT i Sztuczna Inteligencja: Kompleksowe szkolenie z AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Zdobądź mistrzostwo w sztucznej inteligencji: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude AI- kompletny przewodnik po sztucznej inteligencji
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kompleksowe szkolenie z ChatGPT i AI:

Czy jesteś gotowy, aby każdy dzień rozpoczynać z osobistym asystentem, który realizuje Twoje zadania z niezrównaną precyzją i szybkością? Sztuczna inteligencja, która potrafi pisać Twoje maile, artykuły czy raporty, tworzyć inspirujące obrazy, analizować skomplikowane dane, dostarczać niestandardowe rozwiązania i rozwiązywać liczne problemy, umożliwiając Ci skupienie się na tym, co naprawdę ważne.

Aby w pełni wykorzystać te korzyści, musisz opanować AI. Wiele osób ekscytuje się, realizuje 2-3 prompty i na tym kończy, nie odkrywając prawdziwego potencjału sztucznej inteligencji. Często wynika to z braku znajomości technik, metod i ustawień, które pozwalają uzyskać najlepsze wyniki z AI.

Celem tego szkolenia jest przekazanie Ci wszystkich kluczy do efektywnej komunikacji z AI, jej optymalnej konfiguracji i pełnego wykorzystania jej możliwości.

Aby to osiągnąć, opracowałem zwięzły i dynamiczny program, który pozwoli Ci zdobyć niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności do optymalnego wykorzystania AI.

W trakcie tego szkolenia wspólnie omówimy:

  • Jak formułować jasne zapytania do AI, aby uzyskać najlepsze możliwe odpowiedzi.

  • Jak skonfigurować ChatGPT, aby stał się Twoim nauczycielem, współzałożycielem lub zaufanym analitykiem.

  • Jak generować wiele pomysłów i stawać się lepszym w swojej pracy, bardziej produktywnym, szybszym, bardziej trafnym i efektywnym.

  • Jak w pełni wykorzystać multimodalność ChatGPT, aby pisać do niego, mówić, słuchać, przekazywać obrazy i prosić o ich interpretację.

  • Jak zmusić Dall-e lub Copilot do generowania najlepszych możliwych obrazów.

  • Jak znaleźć interesujące alternatywy dla płatnej wersji ChatGPT.

  • Zbadamy także inne AI, takie jak Copilot, Claude czy Gemini.

  • Dowiemy się, jak dostosować ChatGPT do Twoich preferencji i specyficznych potrzeb, aby uzyskać niestandardowe odpowiedzi.

  • Zobaczymy, jak wzmocnić ChatGPT dzięki GPT: jak używać tych aplikacji i nawet jak je tworzyć bez bycia programistą.

  • Przyjrzymy się również bardziej technicznym zagadnieniom na końcu szkolenia, takim jak zarządzanie API, playground, integracja ChatGPT z innymi programami jak Excel czy Google Sheets.

I przede wszystkim, zobaczymy, że to wszystko jest dostępne dla każdego, nawet dla początkujących.

W tym szkoleniu znajdziesz:

  • Konkretne demonstracje.

  • Arkusze techniczne i praktyczne przewodniki do pobrania.


[Aktualizacja: Dodałem filmy dotyczące użycia modelu GPT-4o, który jest następcą wersji GPT-4]

W skrócie, przystępujesz do jasnego, dostępnego i angażującego kursu. Jest on wystarczająco szczegółowy, aby pokryć kluczowe pojęcia, bez zbędnego przeciągania. Niezależnie od Twojego poziomu zaawansowania, czy jesteś początkujący, czy szukasz zaawansowanych technik, to jedyne szkolenie, jakiego potrzebujesz, aby opanować ChatGPT.


Moja prezentacja:

Nazywam się Yassine Rochd, jestem założycielem organizacji szkoleniowej, która pomogła tysiącom osób osiągnąć ich cele zawodowe.

Jestem także pasjonatem technologii. Po ukończeniu studiów magisterskich z finansów i doświadczeniu w konsultingu oraz funduszach inwestycyjnych, odbyłem szkolenie z zakresu web developmentu i spędziłem setki godzin na odkrywaniu i używaniu AI.

Dziś chcę przekazać Ci w jak najjaśniejszy sposób to, czego nauczyłem się przez ostatnie lata.


Certyfikacja i gwarancja:

Po ukończeniu tego szkolenia otrzymasz certyfikat, który będziesz mógł udostępnić na LinkedIn.

Szkolenie jest również bez ryzyka, ponieważ obejmuje 30-dniową gwarancję satysfakcji lub zwrotu pieniędzy.

Masz dożywotni dostęp do szkolenia, zasobów do pobrania oraz przyszłych aktualizacji.

Jesteś o krok od opanowania niezwykle przydatnej technologii, która uczyni Cię bardziej efektywnym, produktywnym i po prostu niezastąpionym.


Szczegółowy opis poszczególnych sekcji tego kursu:

Szybki start z ChatGPT

Dowiedz się, jak szybko opanować ChatGPT w zaledwie kilku filmach. Zanurz się w intuicyjny interfejs ChatGPT i naucz się tworzyć pierwsze prompty, aby w pełni wykorzystać moc AI. Niezależnie od tego, czy chcesz generować tabele, brainstormować, generować pomysły, tłumaczyć i poprawiać teksty, czy też pisać różnorodne treści, z AI będziesz działać szybciej i wydajniej. Zobacz, jak ChatGPT może pomóc w poszukiwaniu pracy i dostosować się do Twoich potrzeb zawodowych, aby zwiększyć efektywność. Zobaczysz, że ChatGPT jest w stanie tworzyć mnóstwo treści, od maili i listów po artykuły i posty na mediach społecznościowych, nie zapominając o pisaniu kodu komputerowego.

Podstawy prompt engineering

Dowiedz się, dlaczego prompt engineering jest kluczowy i jak może przekształcić ChatGPT w prawdziwego eksperta. Zrozum, jak ważny jest kontekst i cele w strukturze interakcji, oraz jak dostosować format i temperaturę, aby zoptymalizować prompty i zmieniać poziom kreatywności modelu. Personalizuj swoje interakcje, opanowując ton i styl, i skorzystaj z 5 praktycznych wskazówek, aby uzyskać jeszcze bardziej trafne odpowiedzi od ChatGPT.

Zaawansowane techniki prompt engineering

W tej sekcji zobaczymy, jak tworzyć prompty, które same generują inne prompty. Przestudiujemy metodę reverse engineering, funkcje wyszukiwania w sieci, interpretacji obrazów i wiele innych zaawansowanych technik.

Dall-e

Przejdziemy do generowania obrazów za pomocą Dall-e. Zobaczysz, jak przejść od przeciętnego wyniku do estetycznych i inspirujących dzieł, jak prosto i szybko modyfikować fragmenty obrazów i optymalizować wyniki. Zbadamy również zaawansowane techniki, które pozwolą na przykład na tworzenie ciągłości w generowaniu postaci fikcyjnych lub komiksowych, dla jeszcze bardziej imponujących rezultatów.

Rozwiązania dla ograniczeń ChatGPT i AI

ChatGPT i inne modele sztucznej inteligencji mają swoje ograniczenia i słabości. W tej sekcji omówimy, jakie są te ograniczenia i jak je przezwyciężyć.

Ciekawe funkcje ChatGPT

Naucz się konfigurować funkcje udostępniania swoich rozmów dla wspólnej pracy z ChatGPT. Wykorzystaj w pełni aplikację mobilną Chat GPT, eksplorując wszystkie oferowane opcje. Odkryj metody tworzenia unikalnych treści za pomocą AI, unikając plagiatu i duplikacji treści.

Copilot i Bing

Copilot oferuje kilka interesujących alternatyw dla płatnych i zaawansowanych funkcji ChatGPT. Zobaczymy, jak skorzystać z partnerstwa Microsoftu i OpenAI, aby uzyskać dostęp do zaawansowanych funkcji sztucznej inteligencji zintegrowanych z wyszukiwarką Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral i inne

W kontynuacji poprzedniej sekcji zbadamy inne AI, takie jak Gemini od Google czy Claude od Anthropic. Zobaczymy ich mocne i słabe strony oraz zbadamy różne przypadki użycia, aby wiedzieć, kiedy lepiej wybrać je zamiast ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Dostosuj ChatGPT do swoich potrzeb i oczekiwań. Naucz się personalizować swoje interakcje, konfigurując swoje custom instructions. Odkryj również, na co zwracać uwagę, aby optymalnie korzystać z AI.

GPTs

Poznaj działanie GPTs, tych mini aplikacji wyspecjalizowanych, które czasem mogą przewyższać ChatGPT. Naucz się krok po kroku tworzyć własne GPT. Opanuj wywołania API, aby maksymalizować możliwości ChatGPT, a na końcu sekcji dowiedz się, jak monetyzować swoje GPTs i szerzej, jak zarabiać dzięki ChatGPT.

Zarządzanie API i Playground

Zbadaj playground ChatGPT i odkryj nowe funkcje, które oferuje. Naucz się wywoływać API ChatGPT o różnym poziomie trudności. Będziesz mógł używać ChatGPT poza interfejsem, tworzyć chatboty na innych stronach lub nawet integrować ChatGPT z innymi programami, takimi jak Google Sheets czy Excel.
targetAudiences: Kurs jest przeznaczony dla każdego, kto chce opanować AI i ChatGPT. Jest odpowiedni dla wszystkich poziomów zaawansowania.

courseDetails.title: Diploma Executivo em Liderança
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Executivo em Liderança
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Executivo em Liderança


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

O nosso objetivo é proporcionar-lhe uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios e considerações éticas que os líderes de hoje enfrentam em vários contextos organizacionais. Começamos por definir o que a liderança realmente implica - não se trata apenas de gerir, mas de inspirar e influenciar os outros para atingir um objetivo comum. Iremos aprofundar várias teorias de liderança. Através de uma mistura de conhecimentos teóricos e estudos de casos práticos, veremos como uma liderança eficaz é crucial para orientar a mudança, moldar a cultura organizacional e defender a ética e a responsabilidade social
Objetivo: Proporcionar uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios que os gestores contemporâneos enfrentam, centrando-se na ética e nas melhores práticas de liderança nas organizações actuais.
Âmbito: A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.
