courseDetails.title: Gratitude
courseDetails.shortDescription: The life transforming power of Gratitude
courseDetails.longDescription:
Gratitude, the attitude that sometimes seem counter-intuitive, especially when we look around and find no reason to engage in it.

It is defined as the quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation for and to return kindness.

Beyond that, it is a quality or trait that you can express by reflection, self and for the people, things and circumstances around you.

It has a few powerful side effects. Some include:

- A change in perspective

- Uplifting ones mood

- Creating a suitable environment, at least within ones mind, that facilitates good decision making   


Gratitude for what, many ask?

Gratitude for Health, Sleep, Food, Body, Mind, Wellbeing, Peace of Mind, Finances, a job, career, income, roof over ones head, ability to earn, appreciate the way the world works and make a living out of it.

Gratitude for interactions, relationships with those around us, our families, children, parents, friends, colleagues, associates.

Gratitude for our professional situations, abilities, opportunities, overcoming challenges and much more.


To build this perspective into ones life is a gift one should bestow on ones self. It helps open up new perspectives at all times.

It also has immense benefits for your health - mentally, physically, emotionally. IT helps with better sleep, better self esteem, improved moods and much more.


The opportunities we have in this one life will be amplified and optimised by a quality such as Gratitude in our lives.


Gratitude to people also help forge better relations. It does not mean we should cease to have our own minds or always defer to what the people we are grateful to want, but it should be demonstrated genuinely, from the heart at every deserving opportunity. It is a privilege to have others support, care and help us.

We ourselves would do well to seek out people to support, care for and help. Not in search of gratitude or having them in our debt, but to show how grateful we are for the things that have come our way, without expecting anything from anyone in return.


Lastly, Gratitude to who?


Whoever you decide or However or Whatever you decide to show Gratitude to in your own way.


Thanks for stopping over on this course and I hope it will contribute to your life in some way.


I am grateful for the privilege to be able to reach you.


Please, remember to reach out and or leave a feedback.


Best regards,

Baba
targetAudiences: Everyone
Students
Professionals
Managers
Leaders
Decision Makers
Adults
Young People

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: Python Development and Python Programming Fundamentals
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introduction / Junior Level: Python Development and Python Programming Fundamentals course by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Python Development and Python Programming Fundamentals by MTF Institute

Course for Introduction / Junior Level Developers, for people who want to begin path of learning of python.


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.



Course Author:

Stanisław Marek Halkiewicz

I am a seasoned educator specializing in the domains of econometrics, statistics, statistical programming, and mathematics, boasting an extensive track record exceeding three years. Notably, I have imparted my expertise to students hailing from prestigious global universities, solidifying my standing as a sought-after tutor. I have made significant contributions in research endeavors spanning statistics, econometrics, and statistical programming. Furthermore, my professional trajectory encompasses a diverse spectrum, ranging from project management to business intelligence and Data Science.


Course Description:

Introduction to Python Development is a course designed to introduce individuals to the world of Python programming. Python has gained immense popularity in recent years for its simplicity, versatility, and readability. This course is ideal for beginners who are new to programming.


Importance For Companies:

Versatility: Python is versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications, from web development and data analysis to artificial intelligence and automation. Companies can benefit from having Python developers who can adapt to various projects.


Productivity: Python's clean and readable syntax allows developers to write code more quickly and efficiently. This results in faster project development and reduced costs for companies.


Large Ecosystem: Python has a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks, making it easier for companies to find solutions to their specific needs. This reduces the need for reinventing the wheel.


Data Analysis and AI: Python is a go-to language for data analysis and machine learning. Companies can leverage Python to extract valuable insights from data and build AI-driven applications.


Community and Support: Python has a strong and active community of developers. Companies can tap into this community for support, resources, and talent recruitment.


Importance For Developers:


Career Opportunities: Learning Python opens up a wide range of career opportunities in various industries. Python developers are in high demand, and their skills are transferable to different domains.


Diversity of Roles: Python developers can work in roles such as web developer, data analyst, data scientist, machine learning engineer, and more. This diversity allows developers to explore different areas of interest.


Ease of Learning: Python's straightforward syntax makes it an ideal choice for beginners in programming. It's also accessible to experienced developers looking to add another language to their skill set.


Continuous Growth: Python is constantly evolving, with new libraries and frameworks being developed. This means that developers who invest in Python education can continue to grow their skill set over time.


Remote Work Opportunities: Python development often allows for remote work, providing developers with flexibility in their careers.


The course "Introduction to Python Development" provides a foundation for individuals looking to embark on a career in programming or expand their skill set. Python's significance in the tech industry, its versatility, and its demand in the job market make it a valuable asset for both companies and developers aiming to excel in today's technology-driven world.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA : Formation complète ChatGPT, Dall-e
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maîtrisez l'IA : ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini | guide complet sur l’intelligence artificielle et les IA génératives
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formation complète ChatGPT & IA génératives :


Etes-vous prêt à démarrer chaque journée avec un allié, un assistant personnel extrêmement doué, prêt à accomplir vos tâches avec une précision et une rapidité inégalée. Une IA capable de rédiger vos mails, articles ou rapports, de créer des images inspirantes, d'analyser des données complexes, de coder des solutions sur mesure et de résoudre une multitude de problèmes, vous permettant ainsi de vous concentrer sur ce qui compte vraiment.


Pour tirer tous ces bénéfices de l’IA encore faut-il la maîtriser. Beaucoup de personnes s’enthousiasment, réalisent 2 ou 3 prompts et finissent par abandonner le sujet sans découvrir le vrai potentiel de l’intelligence artificielle. Derrière ce comportement se cache souvent une méconnaissance des techniques, méthodes, paramétrages qui permettent d’obtenir les meilleurs résultats avec l’intelligence artificielle.


Le but de cette formation c’est donc de vous donner toutes les clés pour communiquer efficacement avec l’IA, la paramétrer au mieux et l’exploiter pleinement.


Et pour y parvenir, j’ai conçu un parcours concis et dynamique qui vous permettra de développer les connaissances et compétences essentielles à l’utilisation optimisée de l’IA.

Au cours de cette formation, nous verrons ensemble :

- Comment formuler des requêtes claires à l’IA pour obtenir les meilleures réponses possibles

- Comment configurer ChatGPT pour qu'il devienne votre professeur, co-fondateur ou analyste de confiance.

- Comment générer de multiples idées et devenir meilleur dans votre travail, plus productif, plus rapide, plus pertinent et efficace.

- Comment profiter pleinement de la multimodalité de ChatGPT pour lui écrire, lui parler, l’écouter, lui transmettre des images et lui demander de les interpréter.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.
targetAudiences: Toute personne souhaitant maîtriser l'IA et ChatGPT. Cette formation est tout niveau.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página de ventas para Hotmart, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA DE VENTAS PARA HOTMART Y AUMENTAR TUS INGRESOS POR MARKETING DE AFILIACIÓN?


Hotmart es una plataforma de venta de cursos modelo Marketplace, fundada en 2011. Con más de 7 millones de usuarios en todo el mundo y transacciones que superan los mil millones de dólares anuales. Se ha consolidado como el líder en ventas de infoproductos en Latinoamérica y mundialmente solo detrás de Udemy.


Actualmente Hotmart tiene más de 420,000 infoproductos registrados, más de 30 millones de usuarios registrados y presencia en más de 190 países.

Esta plataforma consigue ganar dinero a través del cobro por comisiones por la venta de cada curso.


La principal diferencia de Hotmart respecto a otras plataformas para venta de cursos modelo MarketPlace, es que Hotmart cuenta con una estructura un poco más compleja, y tiene más variables en juego, siendo la más relevante y diferencial «el afiliado».

El afiliado se encarga de promocionar y vender los infoproductos de Hotmart, solucionando así uno de los principales problemas de los creadores de contenidos, así es hablamos de las ventas.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando los temas y opciones de diseño que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán su página de ventas al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página de ventas en WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su página de ventas diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu página de ventas.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear páginas de ventas con WordPress y Elementor desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu página de ventas de forma profesional.

  • Cómo adaptar tu página de ventas para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear una página de ventas con WordPress y Elementor de forma rápida y sencilla.



¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender en la plataforma de WordPress y en el constructor visual de Elementor.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca
targetAudiences: Emprendedores y personas que deseen conseguir más ingresos con una página de ventas para Hotmart.
Emprendedores y personas que deseen configurar una página de ventas diseñada profesionalmente desde cero.
Emprendedores y personas que busquen comenzar una carrera en el marketing de afiliación creando una página de ventas.
Emprendedores y personas que quieran aprender a usar WordPress y Elementor de forma profesional.

courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Certificate in Business Management, Leadership, Business Development, Strategy, Risks, Models
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Certificate in Business Management


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 440 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Business management is the process of planning, organizing, directing, and controlling the resources (financial, human, and material) within an organization to achieve its goals and objectives effectively and efficiently. It encompasses a wide range of activities, from setting strategic direction and making operational decisions to managing resources and leading people.


Why Learning and Developing Skills in Business Management are Important for Building a Career:

  1. Versatility: Business management skills are applicable across industries and sectors. Whether you aspire to work in healthcare, technology, finance, or any other field, understanding business fundamentals will give you a strong foundation for success.

  2. Career Advancement: Professionals with strong business management skills are highly sought after for leadership and management positions. Developing these skills can open doors to career advancement opportunities and increased earning potential.

  3. Problem-Solving: Business management teaches critical thinking and problem-solving skills. You'll learn to identify challenges, analyze situations, and develop effective solutions.

  4. Communication and Collaboration: Effective communication and collaboration are essential in any business environment. Strong business managers are able to build relationships, motivate teams, and negotiate successfully.

  5. Adaptability: The business landscape is constantly evolving. Business management skills equip you to adapt to change, embrace new technologies, and navigate uncertainty.


Importance of Learning Linked Topics:

  • Business Models and Value Propositions: Understanding how businesses create, deliver, and capture value is crucial for identifying opportunities, developing new products or services, and ensuring long-term sustainability.

  • Strategic Management and Planning: This involves setting long-term goals, analyzing the competitive environment, and developing strategies to achieve success. Strong strategic thinking is essential for making informed decisions and guiding the organization towards its vision.

  • Organizational Behavior and Leadership: Effective leaders understand how to motivate and inspire teams, manage conflict, and create a positive work environment. Knowledge of organizational behavior is key to building high-performing teams and fostering a culture of innovation.

  • Risk Management and Business Continuity Planning: Businesses face a variety of risks, from financial and operational disruptions to natural disasters. Risk management involves identifying potential threats, assessing their impact, and implementing strategies to mitigate or avoid them. Business continuity planning ensures that critical operations can continue in the event of a disruption.

  • Change Management and Organizational Development: Organizations must continuously adapt to remain competitive. Change management skills are essential for leading and managing change initiatives effectively, while organizational development focuses on improving the overall performance and effectiveness of the organization.

  • Corporate Governance and Compliance: This involves ensuring that the organization operates ethically, transparently, and in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. Strong corporate governance practices build trust with stakeholders and protect the organization's reputation.

By developing a comprehensive understanding of business management and related topics, you'll gain the knowledge and skills necessary to build a successful career, make a positive impact, and contribute to the growth and development of your organization.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma of Mortgage and Lending Broker
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to build your business in finance, mortgage, lending brokering / broking / brokerage.  How to become the broker.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma of Mortgage and Lending Broker by MTF Institute


In that introductional course we will speak about launching of brokering business, about banking pricing, about banking business model and how you may build the partnership with bank. Based on your feedback we will extend that course.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


Role of Mortgage and Lending Brokers

  • Intermediary: Brokers act as the bridge between individuals/businesses seeking loans and the financial institutions that provide them.

  • Consultants and Educators: Brokers guide clients through the complicated world of mortgages and loans, explaining different options and their suitability.

  • Advocates: Brokers work to secure the best possible interest rates and terms for their clients, often negotiating on their behalf.


Typical Functions

  1. Assessing Client Needs: Brokers analyze a borrower's financial situation, goals, and credit history.

  2. Finding Suitable Lenders: They tap into their network of lenders to match the borrower with institutions that fit their profile.

  3. Comparing Options: Brokers present a range of loan products, explaining interest rates, terms, and fees of each.

  4. Application Assistance: They help clients gather paperwork and complete the loan application process.

  5. Underwriting Support: Brokers often act as liaisons between borrowers and lenders during the underwriting (approval) phase.


Why Launching a Business in Broking is a Great Idea

  • Strong Market Demand: The mortgage and lending market is complex and constantly evolving, leading to a high need for expert guidance.

  • Entrepreneurial Flexibility: Brokers enjoy the independence of running their own business, setting their hours, and building their clientele.

  • Income Potential: Earning is commission-based, creating a strong link between your effort and financial success.

  • Rewarding Work: Brokers play a crucial role in helping people achieve major goals like homeownership or business expansion.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career in mortgage and lending brokering

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA: Corso completo sull'IA generativa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Padroneggia l'IA: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - guida completa sull'intelligenza artificiale e le IA generative.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formazione Completa su ChatGPT e IA Generative:

Siete pronti a iniziare ogni giornata con un alleato, un assistente personale estremamente abile, capace di svolgere i vostri compiti con una precisione e una rapidità senza pari?

Un'IA capace di scrivere email, articoli o rapporti, di creare immagini ispiratrici, di analizzare dati complessi, di programmare soluzioni su misura e di risolvere una moltitudine di problemi, permettendovi così di concentrarvi su ciò che conta davvero.

Per ottenere tutti questi benefici dall'IA, è necessario padroneggiarla. Molte persone si entusiasmano, provano 2 o 3 prompt e finiscono per abbandonare il tema senza scoprire il vero potenziale dell'intelligenza artificiale. Questo comportamento spesso è dovuto a una mancanza di conoscenza delle tecniche, dei metodi e delle configurazioni che permettono di ottenere i migliori risultati con l'IA.

L'obiettivo di questa formazione è quindi di fornirvi tutte le chiavi per comunicare efficacemente con l'IA, configurarla al meglio e sfruttarla appieno.

Per raggiungere questo scopo, ho progettato un percorso conciso e dinamico che vi permetterà di sviluppare le conoscenze e le competenze essenziali per l'utilizzo ottimizzato dell'IA.


Durante questa formazione, vedremo insieme:

  • Come formulare richieste chiare all'IA per ottenere le migliori risposte possibili.

  • Come configurare ChatGPT affinché diventi il vostro professore, co-fondatore o analista di fiducia.

  • Come generare molteplici idee e migliorare nel vostro lavoro, diventando più produttivi, più veloci, più pertinenti ed efficienti.

  • Come sfruttare appieno la multimodalità di ChatGPT per scrivergli, parlargli, ascoltarlo, trasmettergli immagini e chiedergli di interpretarle.

  • Come spingere Dall-e o Copilot a generare le migliori immagini possibili.

  • Come trovare alternative interessanti alla versione a pagamento di ChatGPT.

  • Esploreremo anche altre IA come Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Vedremo come adattare ChatGPT alle vostre preferenze e bisogni specifici per risposte su misura.

  • Vedremo come potenziare ChatGPT grazie ai GPT: come utilizzare queste applicazioni e persino come crearle senza essere sviluppatori.

  • Esploreremo anche argomenti più tecnici alla fine della formazione, come la gestione delle API, il playground, l'integrazione di ChatGPT su altri software come Excel o Google Sheets, per esempio.

  • E soprattutto vedremo che tutto questo è accessibile a tutti, anche ai principianti.


In questa formazione troverete:

  • Dimostrazioni concrete.

  • Schede tecniche e guide pratiche scaricabili.

[Aggiornamento: Ho aggiunto video sull'uso del modello GPT4o, successore della versione GPT4]

In breve, vi apprestate a seguire un corso chiaro, accessibile e coinvolgente. Abbastanza dettagliato da coprire i concetti essenziali senza essere troppo lungo. Indipendentemente dal vostro livello di partenza, che siate principianti o alla ricerca di tecniche avanzate, questa è l'unica formazione di cui avrete bisogno per padroneggiare ChatGPT.


La mia presentazione:

Mi chiamo Yassine Rochd, sono il fondatore di un ente di formazione che ha aiutato migliaia di studenti a raggiungere i loro obiettivi professionali.

Sono anche appassionato di tecnologia. Dopo una laurea magistrale in finanza e esperienze nella consulenza e nei fondi di investimento, ho seguito una formazione in sviluppo web e trascorso centinaia di ore a scoprire e utilizzare le IA.

Oggi desidero trasmettervi nel modo più chiaro possibile ciò che ho imparato in questi anni.


Certificazione e garanzia:

Completando questa formazione, riceverete una certificazione che potrete anche condividere su LinkedIn. Questa formazione è inoltre senza rischi, grazie alla garanzia "soddisfatti o rimborsati" di 30 giorni. Avrete accesso a vita alla formazione, alle risorse scaricabili e ai futuri aggiornamenti. Siete a un clic di distanza dal padroneggiare una tecnologia estremamente utile che vi renderà più efficienti, più produttivi e semplicemente indispensabili.


Dettaglio delle diverse sezioni di questo corso:

Introduzione rapida a ChatGPT
Scoprite come padroneggiare rapidamente ChatGPT con poche video lezioni. Esplorate l'interfaccia intuitiva di ChatGPT e imparate a creare i vostri primi prompt per sfruttare appieno la potenza dell'IA. Che si tratti di generare tabelle, fare brainstorming, creare idee, tradurre e correggere testi o redigere vari contenuti, diventerete più veloci e performanti con l'IA. Scoprite come ChatGPT può assistervi nella ricerca di lavoro e adattarsi alle vostre esigenze professionali per aumentare la vostra efficienza. Vedrete che ChatGPT è capace di creare una varietà di contenuti, dalle email e lettere agli articoli e post per i social media, senza dimenticare la scrittura di codice informatico.

Le basi del prompt engineering
Imparate perché il prompt engineering è essenziale e come può trasformare ChatGPT in un vero esperto. Capite l'importanza del contesto e degli obiettivi per strutturare le vostre interazioni e scoprite come regolare il formato e la temperatura per ottimizzare i vostri prompt e variare il livello di creatività del modello. Personalizzate le vostre interazioni padroneggiando il tono e lo stile, e beneficiate di cinque consigli pratici per ottenere risposte ancora più pertinenti da ChatGPT.

Tecniche avanzate di prompt engineering
In questa sezione, vedremo come creare prompt che generano altri prompt. Studieremo il metodo del reverse engineering, le funzionalità di ricerca web, l'interpretazione delle immagini e molte altre tecniche avanzate.

Dall-e
Passeremo alla generazione di immagini con Dall-e. Vedrete come passare da un risultato mediocre a opere estetiche e ispiratrici, come modificare semplicemente e rapidamente porzioni di immagini e ottimizzare i vostri risultati. Studieremo anche tecniche avanzate che vi permetteranno, per esempio, di creare una continuità nella generazione di un personaggio di finzione o di fumetti, per risultati ancora più impressionanti.

Le soluzioni ai limiti di ChatGPT e dell'IA
ChatGPT e altri modelli di intelligenza artificiale presentano dei limiti e delle debolezze. Vedremo in questa sezione quali sono e come superarle.

Funzionalità interessanti di ChatGPT
Imparate a configurare le funzionalità di condivisione delle vostre conversazioni per un utilizzo collaborativo di ChatGPT. Sfruttate al meglio l'applicazione mobile ChatGPT, esplorando tutte le opzioni che offre. Infine, scoprite i metodi per creare un contenuto unico con l'IA evitando qualsiasi forma di plagio o contenuto duplicato.

Copilot e Bing
Copilot propone diverse alternative interessanti a funzionalità avanzate e a pagamento di ChatGPT. Vedremo come sfruttare la collaborazione tra Microsoft e OpenAI per accedere a funzionalità avanzate di intelligenza artificiale integrate nel motore di ricerca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e altri
Nella continuità della sezione precedente, studieremo altre IA come Gemini di Google o Claude di Anthropic. Vedremo i loro punti di forza e di debolezza, e studieremo diversi casi d'uso per sapere quando preferirle a ChatGPT.

Istruzioni personalizzate di ChatGPT
Adattate ChatGPT alle vostre esigenze e aspettative. Imparate a personalizzare le vostre interazioni configurando le vostre istruzioni personalizzate. Scoprite anche i punti di attenzione da considerare per un utilizzo ottimale.

I GPT
Scoprite il funzionamento dei GPT, queste mini applicazioni iperspecializzate che a volte possono superare ChatGPT. Imparate a creare il vostro GPT passo dopo passo. Padroneggiate le chiamate API per massimizzare le capacità di ChatGPT e scoprite alla fine della sezione come monetizzare i vostri GPT e, più in generale, come guadagnare denaro grazie a ChatGPT.

Gestione delle API e Playground
Esplorate il playground di ChatGPT e scoprite le nuove funzionalità che offre. Imparate a chiamare l'API di ChatGPT con livelli di difficoltà crescenti. Potrete così utilizzare ChatGPT al di fuori dell'interfaccia, creare un chatbot su un altro sito o anche integrare ChatGPT in altri software come Google Sheets o Excel, per esempio.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri padroneggiare l'IA e ChatGPT. Questa formazione è per tutti i livelli.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of cybersecurity with our comprehensive course, 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.' This course provides a holistic approach, ensuring you not only comprehend theoretical concepts but also gain practical experience through real-world scenarios.

Whether you're an aspiring ethical hacker or a seasoned professional, this course caters to all levels of expertise. Elevate your skills, safeguard digital landscapes, and become a proficient ethical hacker with 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.

courseDetails.title: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


What is Career Coaching?

Career coaching is a collaborative process between a coach and a client (the coachee). The coach helps the client gain clarity and strategize to achieve their professional goals. This might involve anything from making a major career transition to navigating challenges in their current role


Main Areas of Career Coaching

Career coaching covers a wide range of focus areas. Some of the most common include:

  • Career Exploration: Helping clients define their strengths, interests, and ideal work environments.

  • Goal Setting: Working with clients to set actionable and achievable career goals.

  • Job Search Strategies: Creating effective resumes, cover letters, and improving interviewing skills.

  • Networking and Branding: Building professional networks and developing a strong personal brand.

  • Negotiation Skills: Coaching clients on how to negotiate salary, benefits, and promotions.

  • Leadership Development: Helping those looking to advance into leadership roles grow the necessary skills

  • Performance Enhancement: Identifying areas for improvement and providing strategies to excel in a current role.


How Career Coaching Skills Benefit Clients and Your Own Career

The skills involved in career coaching offer multi-faceted benefits:


Benefits for Consulting Practice

  • Enhanced Client Understanding: Develops deep skills for understanding client needs, goals, and challenges.

  • Goal-Oriented Communication: Provides frameworks for setting clear expectations and tracking progress.

  • Empowerment Strategies: Teaches how to empower clients to take ownership over their careers.

  • Diverse Toolkit: Develops skills like active listening, feedback, and motivational techniques – highly transferable in various consulting fields.

Benefits for Your Own Career Development

  • Self-Awareness: The process forces you to reflect on your own career journey, values, goals, and areas for development.

  • Proactive Mindset: Encouraging clients to take charge translates into your own approach, leading to greater career ownership.

  • Network Expansion: Increases exposure to professionals in various industries, broadening your network and potential opportunities.

  • Growth Mentality: Fosters a focus on continuous learning essential for success in any field.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to work as career coach, build a career or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Complete Course in CATIA
courseDetails.shortDescription: For Students, Engineers, and Designers.
courseDetails.longDescription:
CATIA V5, developed by Dassault Systemes, France, is a completely re-engineered, next-generation family of CAD/CAM/CAE software solutions for Product Lifecycle Management. CATIA V5 delivers innovative technologies for maximum productivity and creativity through its exceptionally easy-to-use and state-of-the-art user interface, from inception to the final product. CATIA V5 reduces the learning curve, as it allows the flexibility of using feature-based and parametric designs.

CATIA V5 serves the design tasks by providing different workbenches. A workbench is defined as a specified environment consisting of tools that allow the user to perform specific design tasks. This course will complete workbenches in CATIA V5 which are Part Design, Wireframe, and Surface Design, Assembly Design, Drafting, Generative Sheetmetal Design, Generative Shape Design. The tutor has used real-world mechanical engineering projects as an example in this video course. This enables the user to relate the tutorials to real-world models in the mechanical engineering industry.

The subject of interpretability offered by CATIA V5 includes receiving legacy data from other CAD systems and from its own product data management modules. The real benefit of CATIA V5 is that the links remain associative. As a result, any change made to this external data gets notified and the model can be updated quickly.
targetAudiences: Engineers, Product Designers, Diploma Holders, Undergraduates and school students.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & AI : 인공지능 완벽 교육
courseDetails.shortDescription: AI 마스터 클래스 : ChatGPT, DALL-E, Claude, Gemini - 인공지능에 대한 완벽 가이드
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT & 생성형 AI 완벽 교육

매일 아침, 탁월한 능력을 지닌 개인 비서이자 동반자로서, 정확하고 신속하게 당신의 작업을 수행할 준비가 된 AI와 함께 하루를 시작할 준비가 되셨나요? 이메일 작성, 기사 작성, 보고서 작성, 영감을 주는 이미지 생성, 복잡한 데이터 분석, 맞춤형 솔루션 코딩 및 다양한 문제 해결을 통해 진정으로 중요한 일에 집중할 수 있도록 돕는 AI 말입니다.

이러한 혜택을 누리기 위해서는 AI를 제대로 이해하고 마스터해야 합니다. 많은 사람들이 인공지능에 관심을 갖고 몇 가지 프롬프트를 시도하지만, 결국 인공지능의 진정한 잠재력을 발견하지 못하고 포기하는 경우가 많습니다. 이러한 결과는 AI로부터 최상의 결과를 얻기 위한 기술, 방법, 설정에 대한 지식이 부족하기 때문입니다.

따라서 이 교육의 목적은 AI와 효과적으로 소통하고, 최적의 설정을 통해 AI를 최대한 활용할 수 있는 모든 열쇠를 제공하는 것입니다.

이를 위해 필수 지식과 기술을 개발할 수 있는 간결하고 역동적인 교육 과정을 설계했습니다.

이 과정에서 우리는 다음을 함께 배울 것입니다:

  • AI에게 명확한 요청을 하여 최상의 답변을 얻는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 신뢰할 수 있는 교사, 공동 창작자 또는 분석가로 설정하는 방법

  • 다수의 아이디어를 생성하고, 업무에서 더 나은 성과를 내며, 더 생산적이고 빠르고 효율적으로 일하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 멀티모달 기능을 최대한 활용하여 텍스트 입력, 음성 대화, 이미지 전송 및 해석을 요청하는 방법

  • DALL-E나 Copilot을 통해 최상의 이미지를 생성하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 유료 버전에 대한 흥미로운 대안을 찾는 방법

  • Copilot, Claude, Gemini와 같은 다른 AI를 탐색하는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 개인의 선호도와 필요에 맞게 조정하여 맞춤형 응답을 얻는 방법

  • GPTs로 ChatGPT를 향상시키는 방법: 이러한 애플리케이션을 사용하는 방법과 개발자가 아니더라도 이를 만드는 방법

  • 교육 후반부에서는 API 관리, Playground, Excel이나 Google Sheets와 같은 다른 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합하는 등 더 기술적인 주제를 다룰 것입니다.

그리고 초보자도 쉽게 접근할 수 있다는 점을 알게 될 것입니다.

이 교육 과정에는 다음이 포함됩니다:

  • 구체적인 시연

  • 다운로드 가능한 기술 자료 및 실용 가이드

  • 정기적으로 업데이트되는 콘텐츠


[업데이트: GPT-4의 후속 모델인 GPT-4o 사용법에 대한 영상을 추가했습니다]


간단히 말해, 명확하고 접근 가능하며 흥미로운 강의를 듣게 될 것입니다. 필수 개념을 다루기에 충분하면서도 길지 않은 강의입니다. 초보자든 고급 기술을 찾는 분이든 상관없이, ChatGPT를 마스터하기 위해 필요한 유일한 교육입니다.


제 소개:

제 이름은 야신 로슈드입니다. 저는 수천 명의 학습자가 그들의 직업적 목표를 달성할 수 있도록 돕는 교육 기관의 창립자입니다.

저는 기술에 열정을 가지고 있습니다. 금융학 석사 학위와 컨설팅 및 투자 펀드에서의 경험을 바탕으로, 웹 개발 교육을 받고 수백 시간을 들여 다양한 AI를 탐구하고 사용했습니다.

오늘, 제가 지난 몇 년 동안 배운 것을 최대한 명확하게 전달하고자 합니다.


인증 및 보장:

  • 이 교육을 완료하면 LinkedIn에 공유할 수 있는 인증서를 받게 됩니다.

  • 또한 이 교육 과정은 30일 환불 보장으로 안심하고 참여할 수 있습니다.


당신을 더 효율적이고, 더 생산적이며, 없어서는 안 될 기술로 무장하게 해 줄 기술을 마스터하기 위한 한 클릭이 남았습니다.


이 과정의 각 섹션 세부 사항


ChatGPT 빠른 시작
몇 개의 비디오만으로 ChatGPT를 신속하게 마스터하는 방법을 배워보세요. ChatGPT의 직관적인 인터페이스에 익숙해지고, 첫 프롬프트를 생성하여 AI의 강력한 기능을 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배워보세요. 표 생성, 브레인스토밍, 아이디어 창출, 텍스트 번역 및 수정, 다양한 콘텐츠 작성 등 ChatGPT와 함께라면 더 빠르고 효율적으로 작업할 수 있습니다. ChatGPT를 활용하여 구직 활동을 지원받고, 직업적 필요에 맞게 맞춤형으로 활용하여 효율성을 높이는 방법도 알아보세요. 이메일, 편지, 기사, 소셜 미디어 게시물, 그리고 코드 작성까지 다양한 콘텐츠를 생성할 수 있는 ChatGPT의 능력을 확인해보세요.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 기초
프롬프트 엔지니어링이 왜 중요한지, 그리고 어떻게 ChatGPT를 진정한 전문가로 변모시킬 수 있는지 배워보세요. 맥락과 목표의 중요성을 이해하고, 상호작용을 구조화하는 방법을 배우며, 프롬프트의 형식과 온도를 조절하여 모델의 창의성 수준을 최적화하는 방법을 알아보세요. 톤과 스타일을 마스터하여 상호작용을 개인화하고, ChatGPT로부터 더 적절한 답변을 얻기 위한 5가지 실용적인 팁을 제공합니다.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 고급 기술
이 섹션에서는 프롬프트를 생성하는 프롬프트를 만드는 방법을 배웁니다. 역공학 방법, 웹 검색 기능, 이미지 해석 기능 등 다양한 고급 기술을 학습합니다.


DALL-E
DALL-E를 사용하여 이미지 생성에 대해 알아보세요. 평균적인 결과에서 아름답고 영감을 주는 작품으로 전환하는 방법, 이미지의 일부를 간단하고 빠르게 수정하는 방법, 그리고 결과를 최적화하는 방법을 배웁니다. 또한, 소설이나 만화 캐릭터 생성에 연속성을 부여하여 더 인상적인 결과를 얻는 고급 기술도 다룹니다.


ChatGPT 및 AI의 한계 해결책
ChatGPT 및 기타 인공지능 모델은 한계와 약점을 가지고 있습니다. 이 섹션에서는 이러한 한계가 무엇인지, 그리고 이를 어떻게 극복할 수 있는지 알아봅니다.


ChatGPT의 흥미로운 기능
ChatGPT를 협업용으로 사용하기 위해 대화 공유 기능을 설정하는 방법을 배웁니다. ChatGPT 모바일 애플리케이션의 모든 옵션을 탐색하여 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배우고, AI를 통해 플래그 없이 독창적인 콘텐츠를 만드는 방법도 알아봅니다.


Copilot 및 Bing
Copilot은 ChatGPT의 유료 고급 기능에 대한 여러 가지 흥미로운 대안을 제공합니다. Microsoft와 OpenAI의 파트너십을 활용하여 Bing 검색 엔진에 통합된 고급 인공지능 기능을 사용하는 방법을 배워보세요.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral 등
이전 섹션의 연장선으로, Google의 Gemini 또는 Anthropic의 Claude와 같은 다른 AI를 살펴봅니다. 이들의 강점과 약점을 파악하고, 어떤 상황에서 ChatGPT 대신 사용하는 것이 더 나은지 알아보세요.


ChatGPT 커스텀 설정
ChatGPT를 필요와 기대에 맞게 조정하세요. 커스텀 설정을 구성하여 상호작용을 개인화하는 방법을 배우고, 최적의 사용을 위해 고려해야 할 주의사항을 알아봅니다.


GPTs
GPTs의 작동 방식을 배우고, 때로는 ChatGPT를 능가할 수 있는 이 초특화된 미니 애플리케이션을 알아보세요. 단계별로 자신의 GPT를 만드는 방법을 배우고, ChatGPT의 기능을 극대화하기 위해 API 호출을 마스터하세요. 또한, 이 섹션의 마지막에서는 GPT를 통해 수익을 창출하는 방법과 더 넓게는 ChatGPT로 돈을 버는 방법을 탐구합니다.


API 관리 및 Playground
ChatGPT의 Playground를 탐색하고 제공되는 새로운 기능을 알아보세요. 단계별로 ChatGPT의 API를 호출하는 방법을 배워, 인터페이스 외부에서 ChatGPT를 사용하거나, 다른 사이트에 챗봇을 만들거나, Google Sheets 또는 Excel과 같은 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합할 수 있습니다.
targetAudiences: 인공지능과 ChatGPT를 마스터하고자 하는 모든 분들을 위한 과정입니다. 이 교육은 모든 수준에 적합합니다.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Product Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.



Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


What is Product Management?

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Why is Learning Product Management Important for Companies and Experts?

  1. Market Relevance and Competitiveness:

    • In an era of rapid technological advancements and evolving consumer preferences, companies must stay relevant. Product management equips professionals with the skills to identify market trends, understand customer needs, and develop products that outpace competitors

  2. Customer-Centric Approach:

    • Successful products are those that solve real problems for customers. Product management emphasizes a customer-centric approach, ensuring that the product aligns with user needs and expectations. This focus enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty

  3. Optimized Resource Allocation:

    • Product managers are adept at prioritizing features and functionalities based on business goals and customer needs. This strategic allocation of resources ensures that the most critical aspects of a product are addressed, maximizing the impact of limited resources

  4. Effective Communication and Collaboration:

    • Product managers act as bridges between various departments, fostering effective communication and collaboration. This ensures that development, marketing, sales, and other teams work cohesively toward a common goal, reducing silos and enhancing overall efficiency

  5. Adaptability and Innovation:

    • The product management discipline encourages a mindset of continuous improvement and innovation. Professionals in this field are equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, incorporate feedback, and drive iterative development, fostering a culture of innovation within the organization

How Knowledge of Product Management Aids Career Development:

  1. Cross-Functional Skillset:

    • Product management requires a diverse skill set that includes market research, strategic planning, communication, and project management. Professionals with expertise in these areas are highly sought after, making product management a versatile career path

  2. Leadership Opportunities:

    • Product managers often take on leadership roles, overseeing teams and guiding product development strategies. The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive product success positions individuals for advancement in their careers

  3. Entrepreneurial Mindset:

    • Product managers are often viewed as the "CEOs of their products." Learning product management instills an entrepreneurial mindset, empowering individuals to take ownership of their projects and make strategic decisions that impact the success of the product

  4. Global Perspective:

    • As products have a global reach, product managers gain exposure to international markets and diverse customer bases. This global perspective enhances their ability to navigate the complexities of the modern business landscape

Product management is a critical discipline for companies aiming to thrive in today's dynamic markets. For professionals, mastering product management opens doors to leadership roles, cultivates an entrepreneurial mindset, and provides a comprehensive skill set that is invaluable in the ever-evolving business landscape.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Product Management or improve their knowledge.
